name: Just A Dream (itch) (Face Punch Studio)
description:
Just a dream is a game made in a week. 

Controls

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look Around

You can complete the levels by going to the level selector and putting in the key at the end of the level. Play in full screen

It has many bugs. Some known bugs right now consist of the pause menu doesn't work at the home. and you can slide on top of the bed in the home base.

The Windows has a lot of issues, would not suggest.
